price: Na lau ungeli ona watapo babaika, basi hapana pa kukimbilia! Na watakamatwa mahala pa karibu.
arabic: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ فَزِعُواْ فَلَا فَوۡتَ وَأُخِذُواْ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
footnotes: Na lau kuwa utaona, ewe mwenye kuona, pale watapo fazaika makafiri kweli itapo dhihiri, basi hawatakuwa na pa kukimbilia. Na watachukuliwa wapelekwe kwenye Moto kutoka pahala karibu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaw tarā idh faziʿū falā fawta wa-ukhidhū min makānin qarībin
